titles.title: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 78) proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States restoring religious freedom.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-563, by Mrs. Myrick.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 199.

action.text: Rule provides for consideration of H.J. Res. 78.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 248 - 169 (Roll No. 196).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/3/1998--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (modified closed) for the consideration of H.J. Res. 78 (religious freedom).
